name: Samir Al-Wahidi
description: Samir, a 62-year-old from a Middle Eastern background, is a creative individual who approaches technology with a beginner's mindset. Despite feeling an urgent need to schedule a doctor visit, he prefers to carefully weigh his options before making decisions, influenced by his risk-averse nature. As someone who communicates concisely and expresses himself minimally, he is focused on ensuring that the visit aligns with his health concerns without unnecessary complications.
